front.title: •I Feel The Conflict
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on table. Each time you win a battle or duel, opponent loses 1 Force (cannot be reduced) and stacks lost card here face down. When attempting to cross Vader over, add 3 to total destiny for each card in stack. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'I know there is good in you. The Emperor hasn't driven it from you fully.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
rulings: If a player loses Force from hand to stack here, it is first revealed to both players.
If a player loses Force from Life Force to stack here, it is not revealed.
Text referring to cards stacked 'on'/'under'/'beneath' this Effect all means the same thing.
